p: The larvae of A. salina (nauplii), are effective to verify if a certain plant sample is toxic. A preliminary toxicity test on plant species is important to verify that the study material may contain substances that cause damage to the health of a population. In addition, toxicity results may point to the possibility that the test material ( T. diversifolia essential oil) may be used for biocidal, repellent and antitumor activities [ 33, 34, 35].
